verbs.description: [ARG0: Kellyanne Conway] [ARGM-DIS: also] [V: pivoted] [ARG3: from a question about President Donald Trump 's tweet on " a drunk / drugged up loser "] [ARG2: to the opioid crisis] .
Kellyanne Conway also pivoted from a question about President Donald Trump 's tweet on " a drunk / [V: drugged] up [ARG1: loser] " to the opioid crisis .
